Liushutong characters (3)

羣字的基本解释

群
qún
相聚成伙的，聚集在一起的：群岛。群山。群书。群芳。群居。群落（lu?）。群集。群雕。群蚁附膻（许多蚂蚁附着在有膻味的东西上；喻臭味相投的人趋炎附势，追逐私利）。
众人：群众。群情。群雄。群策群力。群威群胆。
量词，用于成群的人或物：一群孩子。

羣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qún］
［《廣韻》渠云切，平文，羣。］
亦作“群1”。
(1)特指羊相聚而成的集体。
(2)引申指其它同类动物聚集而成的群。
(3)指人群或物群。
(4)种类。
(5)指同类的人或物。
(6)朋辈；亲族。
(7)社会。
(8)犹众人；群众。
(9)合群；会合。
(10)众，许多。
(11)量词。用于成群的人或物。

羣字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羊字部】　羣； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页952第25
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】渠云切【集韻】衢云切，?音帬。【說文】輩也。【玉篇】朋也。【廣韻】隊也。【易·繫辭】物以羣分。【疏】羣黨，共在一處。【禮·檀弓】吾離羣而索居。【註】羣謂同門，友也。　又【詩·小雅】或羣或友。【傳】獸三爲羣。【禮·曲禮】大夫不掩羣。【疏】羣謂禽獸共聚也。　又【詩·秦風】俴駟孔羣。【鄭箋】孔羣，言和調也。　又緹羣，山名。【後漢·五行志】出吳門，望緹羣。　又羣羣。【李嘉祐詩】荻花寒漫漫，鷗鳥暮羣羣。　又【韻補】叶逵員切。【楊方·合歡詩】不見佳人來，但見飛鳥還。飛鳥亦何樂，夕宿自作羣。

暂无。

group
Basic explanation of words
group
qún
Gathered in groups, gathered together: the archipelago. Mountains. Group of books. Qunfang. social. Community (lu?). Cluster. Group of eagles. Groups of ants are attached to mutton (many ants attach to things with stinky smell; people with similar odors tend to follow suit and pursue self-interest).
Everyone: the masses. Group sentiment. Heroes. Brainstorm. Powerful and courageous.
Quantifier, used for groups of people or things: a group of children.
group
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qún］
["Guangyun" Qu Yunqie, plain text, group. ]
Also known as "Group 1".
(1) Especially refers to the collective formed by the gathering of sheep.
(2) By extension, it refers to a group formed by other animals of the same kind.
(3) Refers to a crowd or group of objects.
(4) Type.
(5) Refers to people or things of the same kind.
(6) Peer; Family.
(7) Society.
(8) Judah; the masses.
(9) Get together; rendezvous.
(10) Many, many.
(11) Quantifiers. Used in groups of people or things.
group
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Sheep character department] 　群; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 952 25
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Qu Yunqi [Ji Yun] Qu Yunqi,? Yinzhen. [Said Wen] Generations too. [Jade articles] Friends also. [Guang Yun] Team also. 【Yi·Ci】Things are divided into groups. 【Sparse】The party is in one place. [Li·Tan Gong] I live alone and live alone. [Note] Group means the same door, but also friends.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] or group or friend. [Biography] The three beasts are a group. 【Li·Chu Li】Doctors don't hide the group. [Sparse] The group is also called a gathering of animals and animals.　[Poetry·Qin Feng] A group of sibling holes. [Zheng Jian] Kong Qun, speaks and tunes.　You Ti Qun, the name of the mountain. [The History of the Five Elements in the Later Han Dynasty] Go out of Wumen and look at Tiqun.　Quanqun again. [Li Jiayou Poems] The flowers of the Diwali are very cold, and the birds and gulls flock in the evening.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Kui cut. [Yang Fang·Huan Poem] I didn't see the beautiful woman, but I saw the bird return. Flying birds are also happy, and Xisu makes a group by themselves.
